Paradise Golf Course All courses United States Florida Paradise Golf Course Join 4.8M+ golfers worldwide today. Download now! Hole19 is the leading golf app for tracking scores, navigating courses with GPS precision, and unlocking performance insights. 4.4 Paradise Golf Course Arcadia, FL, United States This course is mapped and available on Hole19 App Play Paradise Golf Course in Florida! Enjoy a 12-hole championship course, scenic views, practice facilities & southern hospitality. Description Located in the heart of sunny Florida, Paradise Golf Course offers a one-of-a-kind golfing experience on its innovative 12-hole championship layout. Perfectly blending challenge and relaxation, itâ€™s the only course of its kind in the region, providing a unique opportunity to enjoy a full round in under three hours. Whether you're a local enthusiast or visiting golfer, the course's natural beauty, abundant wildlife, and warm southern hospitality create an unforgettable experience. Golfers of all skill levels are welcome, with the course catering to both walkers and cart riders alike. 

Practice your swing at the well-maintained practice facilities before heading out, and after your round, unwind at the inviting clubhouse, complete with comfortable seating and refreshments. The serene landscape and commitment to exceptional service make Paradise Golf Course a must-visit destination for golf lovers. Come see why golfers from around Florida and beyond rave about the unmatched charm of Paradise Golf Course. Welcome to Paradise Valley Golf Club! - Paradise Valley Country Club Paradise Valley Country Club Welcome! About Scorecard Instructors History of PVCC Tee Times Directions Outings Golf Outings at Paradise Valley Private Events Membership Contact Us Employment Newsletter Sign-up Skip to main content Skip to footer We Bring You An Experience Like No Other! Paradise Valley Golf Club Paradise Valley Golf Club was established in 1967 and is situated in a picturesque valley surrounded with magnificent woods and abundant with native wildlife. We are a year round, full service facility open to the public. Enjoy a round of golf at our elaborate eighteen-hole golf course that challenges players of every ability. PGA Golf Professionals will accommodate your every need, whether it be organizing your golf outing, golf instruction or the quality equipment and apparel that is available in our outstanding Golf Pro Shop. Book Tee Times Book a Tee Time Tee times are available up to 7 days in advance! Book Now Directions Course Access Update: Hillsboro Road Construction See Directions Outings Host your next golf outing  where memories are made and fun is had. Learn More Footer Visit Us Paradise Valley Country Club 1055 Lochmoor Drive St. Louis, MO 63049 Contact Phone: (636) 225-5157 Email: mckenziemiller@paradisevalleygolfstl.com Facebook Instagram Newsletter Sign-up Paradise Valley Country Club | 1055 Lochmoor Drive St. Louis, MO 63049 | 636-225-5157 Copyright Â© 2025 Paradise Valley Country Club All Rights Reserved. Events Our event center offers excellent space, views and service for your guests Eclub Signup Sign up to receive exclusive offers and updates from Paradise Hills The Office Bar & Grill Stop in for a pre-round and post-round bite at The Office Bar & Grill Welcome to the Golf Course Paradise HillsÂ is the only privately owned public golf course in Albuquerque, NM. Our golf course offers spectacular views of the Sandias and Albuquerqueâ€™s city skyline, as well as a challenge for any skill level. Enjoy a round of 9 or 18 holes, and stay to enjoy refreshing food and drinks at The Office Bar & Grill. Paradise Hills Golf Course is open year-round from sunup to sundown (actual hours vary by season). Warm up on our driving range and hit the course for competitive or social play. To really improve your game, inquire about lessons from our PGA Professionals. The Paradise Hills Golf Course houses two event venues ideal for indoor and outdoor weddings and parties up to 300 people. Our space is well-suited for business meetings and banquet events too! All venues include event coordination service by our certified event coordinator. Contact us to schedule a tour of our event center and book your event today! Indoor Golf Essex County - Golf Paradise Club About Indoor Golf Lessons Womenâ€™s Group Lesson Indoor Golf Events and Parties Indoor Golf Leagues Fall League Registration Dads and Lads League Memberships News, Golf Tips & Updates Contact Us Play, Practice, Perfect - Indoor Golf at Its Best Year-Round Indoor Golf & Driving Range for All Skill Levels. Bays Starting at $25/hr! Mon-Thur 8AM-10PM, Fri & Sat 8AM-12AM & Sun 10AM-6PM Reserve A Bay Weekdays $25 per hour Additional Golfers are Only $10Â per Golfer Walk-ins Happily Accepted Reserve A Bay About Golf Paradise Clubâ€‹ Located in Verona, New Jersey, Golf Paradise Club (GPC) has revolutionized the indoor golf simulator experience for Essex County golfers. This state-of-the-art facility features 24 premium GOLFZON indoor golf simulator bays, offering year-round access to world-class golf simulation technology that transforms how players practice, play, and perfect their game. Advanced Indoor Golf Simulator Technology Golf Paradise Clubâ€™s GOLFZON indoor golf simulator system represents the pinnacle of golf simulation technology. Each spacious simulator bay features advanced sensor technology and high-speed cameras that track every aspect of your swing with remarkable precision. The automated teeing system seamlessly accommodates both right and left-handed players, getting you ready to swing in under 30 seconds without keyboards or complex controls. The indoor golf simulator technology captures hundreds of data points in real-time, from club head speed and ball trajectory to spin rate and impact angle. Unlike basic driving range simulators, the GOLFZON system analyzes short game shots and putting with the same precision as full swings, providing comprehensive golf practice opportunities that directly translate to improved outdoor course performance. High-definition projectors display photorealistic golf courses with stunning clarity, creating an immersive indoor golf simulator environment that makes players feel as though theyâ€™re standing on prestigious courses worldwide. The systemâ€™s advanced graphics engine renders everything from subtle green undulations to challenging weather conditions, providing a complete golf experience that extends far beyond simple ball striking. Year-Round Indoor Golf Simulator Access The indoor golf simulator experience at Golf Paradise Club eliminates weather, seasonal, and daylight limitations that traditionally constrain golf enthusiasts. Operating Monday through Thursday from 8 AM to 10 PM, Friday and Saturday from 8 AM to midnight, and Sunday from 8 AM to 8 PM, the facility provides convenient access to premium indoor golf simulator technology whenever players want to practice or play. Players can choose from dozens of world-renowned golf courses, each meticulously recreated with accurate topography and playing conditions. Whether experiencing the challenging links of St. Andrews or the pristine fairways of Augusta National, the indoor golf simulator brings legendary courses to life with authentic playing characteristics and dynamic conditions that change throughout each round. Affordable Indoor Golf Simulator Memberships Golf Paradise Club offers exceptional value with indoor golf simulator bay rates starting at just â€‹$25 per â€‹ hourÂ onÂ weekdays, â€‹ with â€‹ additional â€‹ players â€‹ joining â€‹ f or â€‹ only â€‹ $5 per hour â€‹. New customers receive one hour of free simulator time to experience the technology and facility quality. The facility provides four membership levels designed to maximize value for regular indoor golf simulator users: **Paradise Membership ( 25/month)âˆ—âˆ—: Exclusive discounts on bay bookings, saving 25/month)**: Exclusive discounts on bay bookings, saving 25/ m o n t h ) âˆ— âˆ— : E x c l u s i v e d i sco u n t s â€‹ o n â€‹ ba y â€‹ b oo kin g s , â€‹ s a v in g â€‹ $ 5 per hour on open bays and â€‹$ 10 â€‹ per hour on private bays, with â€‹ g uestÂ ratesÂ of â€‹ $ 1 â€‹ â€‹ 0 per hour on private bays â€‹. Gold Membership ($150/month) : Up to two hours of daily free access to open simulator bays on weekdays, with Paradise member discounts on weekends. Student Membership ($99/month) : Up to two hours of free daily play on weekdays, designed specifically for students seeking affordable access to premium golf technology. Couple Membership ($250/month) : Perfect for partners wanting to enjoy the indoor golf simulator experience together, with up to two hours of free daily weekday play. Professional Instruction and Community Golf Paradise Clubâ€™s PGA-certified instructors leverage the detailed data provided by the indoor golf simulator system to offer personalized instruction that accelerates skill development. The combination of expert guidance and precise technological feedback creates learning opportunities unavailable through traditional teaching methods. The facility has created a vibrant community through golf simulator leagues open to all skill levels, tournaments, and social events. The indoor golf simulator environment levels the playing field by providing consistent conditions for all participants, while the handicap system ensures fair competition between players of varying abilities. Premium Amenities and Convenience Golf Paradise Club welcomes walk-ins and features a BYOB-friendly policy, creating a relaxed atmosphere that encourages social interaction and extended sessions. The facility offers food options including sandwiches and snacks, while comfortable seating areas and climate control ensure year-round comfort.Â  You can even get an ice cream cone! The convenient Verona location provides easy access for players throughout Essex County, with ample parking and extended hours that accommodate busy schedules. Equipment storage options allow regular players to keep clubs at the facility, eliminating transportation hassles. Experience the Future of Golf Simulation Golf Paradise Club represents the evolution of golf into a technology-enhanced experience that maintains all the tradition and challenge of the classic game while eliminating historical barriers to access and enjoyment. Visit Golf Paradise Club today and discover why their indoor golf simulator facility has become Essex Countyâ€™s premier destination for year-round golf excellence. Enjoy up to 2 hours of free play per day on the weekdays in any open bay. Paradise membership rates on weekends. 1 bay per couple, a second bay subject to availability. Ideal for couples who love to golf and unwind together Flexible weekday playtime to fit into your busy schedules A fun way to stay active and enjoy quality time together Get Started State-of-the-Art Golf Simulation Experience the pinnacle of indoor golf with GOLFZONâ€™s cutting-edge technology, exclusively available at Golf Paradise Club. Our 24 spacious simulation bays are equipped with an automated teeing system that seamlessly adjusts for both right- and left-handed players, getting you ready to swing in under 30 secondsâ€”no setup hassle, no keyboard or mouse needed. With advanced tracking for every detail of your game, including short shots and putting, you can refine your skills like never before. Track your progress, review your stats, and celebrate your achievements with ease using the GOLFZON app. Contact Us Golf Lessons Sharpen your skills with personalized lessons from PGA-accredited instructors at Golf Paradise Club. Whether youâ€™re a beginner or an experienced golfer, our expert coaching will help you improve every aspect of your game. Ready to take your skills to the next level? Read More Golf Leagues Experience the excitement of league play at Golf Paradise Club! Join a community of golfers, enjoy friendly competition, and track your progress in a fun and supportive environment. Leagues are open to all skill levelsâ€”find your place on the green with us. Open Daily 8AM â€“ 11PM Year Round Fun At Paradise Golf, we donâ€™t just offer a place to practiceâ€”we provide unmatched value that sets us apart. While other facilities may have short game areas, demo clubs, or rewards programs, they often come with extra fees. We include these benefits at no additional cost, along with 2-for-1 pricing on weekday mornings, fresh mats, and new balls each season. Private Golf Lessons Visit our private teaching studio, where our PGA-certified instructors provide one-on-one coaching to help golfers of all skill levels Custom Club Fitting Our custom club fitting services, staffed by PGA golf professionals, ensure that your equipment matches your swing, helping you hit the ball longer, straighter, and with more control. Golf Clinics We believe in growing the game, which is why we offer golf clinics for all skill levels. Groups We offer special rates on groups of 10 or more to come and enjoy a fun time at Paradise. Mini Golf Course Our beautifully designed mini golf course offers exciting holes including a 35 foot tree fort and a flowing river hole that takes your ball downstream and returns to the course. Snack Bar After your game come to our clubhouse and enjoy a delicious treat. We have Treadwells Ice Cream, Richiesâ€™ Premium Slush and softserve ice cream, and a number of custom treats that are always a hit at Paradise. Take your selection outside and enjoy our Koi Pond. Birthday Parties Make your childâ€™s birthday a hole-in-one celebration with our birthday party packages! INDOOR STUDIOS Trackman golf simulators Check OUT Our Simulators VISIT TODAY Elevate Your Golf Game Our state-of-the-art golf facility offers everything you need to improve your game and have fun. State-of-the-Art Practice Facilities â€“ Enjoy TrackMan technology, target greens, and covered, heated tees for year-round practice, along with a dedicated short game area featuring realistic greens and bunker access. High-Tech Simulators & Expert Instruction â€“ Improve your game with TrackMan golf simulators for swing analysis, virtual play, and competitive leagues, plus private lessons and custom club fitting with PGA professionals. Fun for Everyone â€“ Join golf clinics for all ages and skill levels or enjoy a round of mini golf with family and friends. Pro Shop & Gear â€“ Stay equipped with a fully stocked pro shop offering the latest gear and expert guidance. While other ranges may simply provide balls and a mat, we go the extra mile to ensure you get the most for your money. From high-quality equipment and advanced technology to exclusive perks and year-round comfort, hereâ€™s what sets us apart: Premium Practice Experience â€“ Enjoy brand-new balls and mats each year, covered heated bays for year-round comfort, and a dedicated short game area for chipping and putting. Exclusive Deals & Rewards â€“ Take advantage of the weekday bucket special (2-for-1 from 8â€“11 AM) mats only, earn loyalty points on every bucket purchase, and save with discount debit cards. Advanced Technology & Instruction â€“ Improve your game with six TrackMan studios for private or open play and learn from four PGA professionals. Pro Shop Perks & Club Demos â€“ Get 50% of your pro shop purchase back in points and demo the latest clubs with any bucket purchaseâ€”just leave your license. At Paradise Family Golf, you donâ€™t just get a bucketâ€”you get a better golf experience. FAMILY OUTINGS & BIRTHDAYS LEARN MORE TODAY Unforgettable Birthday Party Packages. Secret shareholders of elite Scottish golf club uncovered in Paradise Papers documents - ICIJ Skip to content Investigations China Targets Caspian Cabals Pandora Papers Cyprus Confidential Panama Papers More Investigations Latest Data Offshore Leaks Database Medical Devices Database Datashare Journalists About ICIJ About ICIJ Our team Corporate ICIJâ€™s awards Media partners Our supporters Work with us Ways to give Leak to ICIJ Newsletter Donate Donate Investigations China Targets Caspian Cabals Pandora Papers Cyprus Confidential Panama Papers More Investigations Latest Data Offshore Leaks Database Medical Devices Database Datashare Journalists About ICIJ About ICIJ Our team Corporate ICIJâ€™s awards Media partners Our supporters Work with us Ways to give Leak to ICIJ Newsletter Donate Investigations Paradise Papers PARADISE PAPERS Secret shareholders of elite Scottish golf club uncovered in Paradise Papers documents Scottish investigative outlet The Ferret found billionaires, bankers and sports stars were behind a Cayman Islands firm that owns the picturesque Loch Lomond Golf Club. By Sam Ellefson Image: David Cannon/Getty Images January 24, 2025 The clubhouse Rhossdhu House behind the 8th green at Loch Lomond Golf Club in Scotland. Top U.K. political donors and a Scottish football star were among more than 500 secret shareholders of an offshore firm behind an elite golf club in Scotland identified by investigative journalism outlet The Ferret in leaked Paradise Papers documents. Details about the ownership of the exclusive Loch Lomond Golf Club were not previously known as the club is owned and operated by a firm incorporated in the Cayman Islands, a British overseas territory and a secrecy jurisdiction. ICIJâ€™s 2017 Paradise Papers investigation was based on 13.4 million leaked files from a slew of offshore financial service providers, obtained by German newspaper SÃ¼ddeutsche Zeitung. The Ferretâ€™s new reporting reveals that, as of 2014, the ownership of Loch Lomond Golf Club Limited included politicians, business executives, bankers and sports players. Recommended reading IMPACT Chilean authorities expect to recoup more than $1.5B after ICIJ investigations, government data reveals Oct 11, 2024 QUESTION TIME The Paradise Papers: What do you want to know? Oct 04, 2018 Accountability Top EU court rules Apple owes Ireland over $14B in back taxes Sep 13, 2024 The findings come as the U.K. government faces ongoing pressure to ensure its overseas territories and crown dependencies introduce public beneficial ownership registers. In recent years, the U.K.â€™s so-called â€œsecond empireâ€ has accounted for nearly a quarter of the worldâ€™s corporate tax loss, according to the Tax Justice Network. The Ferret noted there was no indication of tax abuse by the company that owns the golf club, which is less than an hourâ€™s drive from Glasgow, its shareholders or the clubâ€™s members. However, The Ferret found the club had run up losses â€” and therefore avoided corporate tax liability â€” in most of the years since the buyout. Few of the shareholders named in the documents responded to The Ferretâ€™s requests for comment. The golf club management and the U.K. government did not respond either. Ferret reporter Jamie Mann told ICIJ he was unable to verify whether all of the shareholders identified retained shares due to secrecy provisions in the Cayman Islands. Leak to us Contact ICIJ Do you have a story about corruption, fraud, or abuse of power? ICIJ accepts information about wrongdoing by corporate, government or public services around the world. We do our utmost to guarantee the confidentiality of our sources. LEAK TO ICIJ The Cayman Islands has been slow to address corporate transparency concerns. The Financial Times reported in November that the Cayman Islands government missed a key December 2023 target to implement its public beneficial ownership register. Instead, the territory recently agreed to implement a â€œlegitimate accessâ€ register, available to journalists and non-governmental organizations, by June 2025. Loch Lomond Golf ClubÂ â€” which reportedly has a first-time registration fee of up to $165,400 â€” overlooks its namesake lake from a 660-acre estate. The club hosted the Scottish Open golfing tournament for more than a decade, and includes an 18th-century spa and a Georgian mansion. The clubâ€™s website boasts that â€œthe privilege of membershipâ€ and â€œopportunity to play our extraordinary courseâ€ is only extended to those invited by existing members or the club itself. Members of the golf club reportedly purchased the property in the early 2010s after it was slated to be sold following its previous ownersâ€™ failure to restructure his debts with the Bank of Scotland. A group of members then bought the club to â€œretain its exclusivity,â€ according to its website. The purchase was confirmed in 2011. Want to know when we publish? Help us change the world. Get our stories by email. That push for exclusivity was reflected in the 2014 list of shareholders reviewed by The Ferret, which included top sports players such as footballers Ally McCoist, Alan Shearer and Ian Wright; cricket coach Paul Collingwood; and golfer Gordon Sherry. The list of shareholders also included several prominent business people, from real estate magnates to executives at Barclays bank and accounting giant Deloitte. Companies owned by a current director of the club, businessman Robin MacGeachy, have donated millions of pounds to the Labour, Conservative and Liberal Democrats parties since 2014, according to The Ferret. Deceased Kuwaiti businessman Fahad Al-Rajaan, who fled to London following accusations that he had embezzled millions of dollars from Kuwaitâ€™s state pension fund, was listed as a shareholder, too. Labour politician and party donor Baron William Haughey was also on the list. Scottish newspaper The Herald previously reported on Haugheyâ€™s sonâ€™s business connections to a parent company incorporated in the British Virgin Islands. â€œA parent company located in the Cayman Islands offers two distinctive advantages for Loch Lomond Golf Club â€” the first is its tax haven status for avoidance purposes, the other is the secrecy it affords its beneficial owners wanting to hide from transparency and scrutiny,â€ Claire Aston, a tax policy expert and director of TaxWatch, told The Ferret. GIVE TO HELP US INVESTIGATE! Help us fight corruption, injustice and inequality with just $25/month. Donate now â€œNeither is in the public interest for UK taxpayers and the case shows the need for public registers of beneficial ownership to be implemented by the British overseas territories and Crown Dependencies.â€ In November 2024, more than three dozen members of U.K. Parliament sent a letter to Foreign Secretary David Lammy calling for previously mandated public beneficial ownership registers to be implemented in British overseas territories and crown dependencies that serve as tax havens. The MPs cited several ICIJ investigations, including the Paradise Papers, in their letter. â€œFrustratingly, those with the worst track record â€” including the British Virgin Islands and the Cayman Islands â€” have failed to even provide a clear timeline for establishing public registers,â€ the letter said. â€œIt appears that some Overseas Territories and Crown Dependencies have no intention of introducing a public register.â€ Topics: Europe , Investigative journalism , Offshore secrecy , Paradise Papers Donate Contact reporter Our team Sam Ellefson Editorial Fellow Contact Want to know when we publish? Help us change the world. Get our stories by email. Paradise Entertainment Limited | Directors and Senior Management Home About Us Corporate Profile | Statement from the Board | Corporate Milestone | Directors and Senior Management Business Casino Management Services | Gaming Equipment and Systems Investor Relations Announcements & Circulars | Financial Reports | Corporate Presentation | Stock Information | Corporate Governance Media Centre Career Why Paradise | Job Vacancies EN | ç®€ | ç¹ Directors and Senior Management Home About Us Directors and Senior Management EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS SENIOR MANAGEMENT Dr. Jay Chun CHAIRMAN AND MANAGING DIRECTOR Dr. Jay Chun , aged 60, is an executive Director, Chairman of the Board and Managing Director of the Company, also alternate Director to Mr. Shan Shiyong, alias, Sin Sai Yung. He is the chairman of the Nomination Committee and a member of the Remuneration Committee. He is also a director of various subsidiaries of the Company. Dr. Chun is a talented entrepreneur and manager. He possesses solid background in information technology and marketing, and has 34 years of management and investment experience. Dr. Chun holds a doctoral degree in business administration from the University of Macau, a masterâ€™s degree in business administration from the W.P. Carey School of Business at the Arizona State University and a bachelorâ€™s degree in computer science from the Shanghai University of Science and Technology. Dr. Chun joined the Group and was appointed as the Managing Director of the Company in January 1999.He was appointed as the Chairman of the Board in July 2002, was re-designated from the Chairman of the Board to a Co-chairman of the Board in December 2022 and was re-designated from a Co-chairman of the Board to the Chairman of the Board on 27 March 2025. Dr. Chun has been particularly caring for the development of the Country. He is a member of the Standing Committee of the Shandong Provincial Committee of the Chinese Peopleâ€™s Political Consultative Conference of the PRC. He is also a member of the Council of the Shanghai University. In addition, Dr. Chun has been actively participating in community services. He is presently the chairman of Ze Ai Association and honorary chairman of Ze Ai Charity Association, which are prominent non-profit making charitable organisations committed to caring for the elderly, women and children as their core goals, and have been adhering to the mission of â€œquality care, all-round developmentâ€ for the commission of charity work in Mainland China and Macau. In recognition of his outstanding achievement in Macau, in October 2019, Dr. Chun was honoured with the award of â€œ20 Persons in 20 Years: the Most Valuable Persons of Macaoâ€™s Tourism and Leisure Industry from 1999 to 2019â€. Read More >> Mr. Shan Shiyong, alias, Sin Sai Yung Executive Director Mr. Shan Shiyong, alias, Sin Sai Yung , aged 61, is an executive Director. He is also a director of various subsidiaries of the Company. Mr. Shan is an entrepreneur with strong business vision. After completing his studies in economics at the Shandong Agricultural University in the PRC, he started his own business in manufacturing and exporting. Mr. Shan subsequently diversified his business interests to trading, property development and venture capital investment in the PRC. He has 37 years of dedicated business, investment and management experience at the owner level. Mr. Shan joined the Group and was appointed as an executive Director in October 1998. He was the Chairman of the Board from May 1999 to July 2002. Read More >> Mr. Li John Zongyang INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR Mr. Li John Zongyang , aged 69, was appointed as an independent non-executive Director on 10 September 2007. He is the chairman of both the Audit Committee and the Remuneration Committee and a member of the Nomination Committee. Mr. Li has a rich and versatile background in the finance, business and corporate environment in the Asia-Pacific region. Mr. Li had worked for 10 years with Framlington Investment Management Company Limited, a leading investment management company in London, where he served as a senior fund manager and the head of the Asia Pacific region. Mr. Li had served as the chief executive officer for several reputable companies in Asia. Mr. Li holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in economics from the Peking University in the PRC and a masterâ€™s degree in business administration from the Middlesex University Business School in London. Read More >> Ms. Tang Kiu Sam Alice INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR Ms. Tang Kiu Sam Alice , aged 43, was appointed as an independent non-executive Director on 25 April 2014. She is a member of each of the Audit Committee, the Remuneration Committee and the Nomination Committee. Ms. Tang graduated with a bachelor of science degree in e-commerce from the Brunel University in London. Ms. Tang has more than 20 years of business development experience in the gaming industry and has comprehensive knowledge in gaming operations and products, strategic planning, sales and marketing and is experienced in product development with successful launches of a series of gaming products including video slot machines, electronic table games and slot management system. Ms. Tang is currently the managing director of Winning Asia Technology Macau Limited. Read More >> Dr. Liu Ka Ying Rebecca INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR Dr. Liu Ka Ying Rebecca , aged 55, was appointed as an independent non-executive Director and a member of the Audit Committee on 28 March 2023. Dr. Liu graduated from the York University, Canada with a double bachelorâ€™s degree in business administrative studies with major in management and in accounting (with honours) in November 1992 and November 1994, respectively, and further obtained a doctoralâ€™s degree in business administration from the Victoria University of Switzerland in November 2011. Dr. Liu possesses extensive experience in management, finance, investment, as well as accounting and financial management, and is currently the senior vice president of Fortune (Shanghai) Limited. She was the general manager for the Asia and China region of PRG-Schultz International, Inc., a company listed on NASDAQ (NASDAQ: PRGX), from June 1996 to March 2002. Dr. Liu has been an independent non-executive director of Logan Group Company Limited (stock code: 3380) since November 2013 and SITC International Holdings Company Limited (stock code: 1308) since December 2020, and a non-executive director and the vice chairman of the board of directors of Culturecom Holdings Limited (stock code: 343) since January 2023. Dr. Liu was an independent non-executive director of Renaissance Asia Silk Road Group Limited (stock code: 274) during the period from August 2022 to November 2024. The shares of all of them are listed on the Main Board of the Stock Exchange. Dr. Liu is a member of the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants (AICPA), the Illinois CPA Society of the United States (ICPAS) and the Hong Kong Institute of Certified Public Accountants (HKICPA). Dr. Liu is also a member of the Hong Kong Institute of Bankers, the Association of Women Accountants (Hong Kong) Limited, and the Hong Kong Professionals and Senior Executives Association. She was also a former member of the Tenth and the Eleventh Jilin Provincial Committee of the Chinese Peopleâ€™s Political Consultative Conference of the PRC. Read More >> Ms. Feng Yi, Jenny SENIOR VICE PRESIDENT Ms. Feng Yi, Jenny , aged 60, is the Groupâ€™s Senior Vice President. Ms. Feng studied at the Shanghai University of Science and Technology. She has extensive experience in business management and promotion. She is the spouse of Dr. Chun, an executive Director. Ms. Feng joined the Group in 2006. Ms. Feng is enthusiastic about charitable and community services. She is a director of the China Next Generation Education Foundation. Read More >> Mr. Au Hon Man CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER Mr. Au Hon Man , aged 50, is the Groupâ€™s Chief Operating Officer of the electronic gaming business. Mr. Au holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in engineering from the University of Melbourne. Prior to re-joining the Group, he founded various high-tech companies engaging businesses relating to software development, system integration and project management, etc. Mr. Au joined the Group in 2008 for the first time. He has over 17 years of management experience in gaming industry in particular in areas of software and project development. Mr. Au re-joined the Group in November 2023. Read More >> Mr. Chan Kin Man CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER AND COMPANY SECRETARY Mr. Chan Kin Man , aged 49, is the Groupâ€™s Chief Financial Officer and Company Secretary. Mr. Chan holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in business administration in accounting and finance from The University of Hong Kong. He has over 27 years of experience in accounting, auditing, financial advisory, corporate finance and corporate governance, particularly in entertainment and hospitality sectors. He is a fellow of both the Hong Kong Institute of Certified Public Accountants and the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants. Mr. Chan joined the Group in February 2017.
